description: Sticker Visa processed via Consulate/Embassy/VFS (e.g., Japan, South Korea).

meta.fee_euro_approx: Varies (Often low visa fee + VFS charge)

documents.title: Original Passport
documents.description: Must be submitted physically. Valid for 6 months.

documents.title: Physical Photos
documents.description: 2 recent photos glued to the form.

documents.title: Financial Proof
documents.description: Bank statements (3-6 months) and ITR (3 years).

documents.title: Cover Letter
documents.description: Detailed itinerary and purpose of visit.

steps_flow.title: Prepare Documents
steps_flow.description: Gather all physical documents and photos.

steps_flow.title: Submit Application
steps_flow.description: Submit at VFS Global or Consulate (Walk-in or Appointment).

steps_flow.title: Processing
steps_flow.description: Passport is held at the consulate for processing.
